title: Champion Skin Portrait Icon Bug
body:
Hiya :)

I know this is still on the PBE, but I was watching a streamer playing ARURF on the PBE earlier (Ash_on_LoL).

She had Nidalee with a Nidalee skin, and the portrait reflected that. However, whenever Nidalee changed into cougar form, the icon reverted back to the classic portrait (and not the skin one).

Thanks, and hope this helps :D

replies.body:
Hey there,

This would be better suited for the [PBE Bugs](https://boards.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bugs) board, before posting please be sure to read the [[HOW-TO] Report Bugs on the PBE](https://boards.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bugs/CF5EEDC8FF5AC1A896F517E2C7AE4650C472807F-how-to-report-bugs-on-the-pbe) thread.
